definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: No significant relationship was evidenced between exhaled NO and PEF variations.
sentences.chinese: 呼出的一氧化氮和PEF變化無顯着關係。

sentences.english: When inhaling the nitrous oxide, you are exposing your brain to the gas.
sentences.chinese: 吸入一氧化氮時，你就等於把大腦暴露於其中。

sentences.english: Immunohistochemical method was used to examine iNOS protein expression in aorta.
sentences.chinese: 免疫組化法觀察主動脈誘導型一氧化氮合酶蛋白表達。

sentences.english: To study the changes of circulating endothelial cells (CEC) and nitric oxide (NO) levels in children with acute glomerular nephritis.
sentences.chinese: 探討小兒急性腎炎對循環內皮細胞與一氧化氮的改變。

sentences.english: Nitrous oxide is also a greenhouse gas.
sentences.chinese: 氮化物一氧化氮也是溫室氣體的一種。

sentences.english: They discovered a pathway that inhibits nitric oxide and thus impedes blood flow.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現了抑制一氧化氮並阻止血液流動的途徑。

sentences.english: Aim To explore the relationship between nitric oxide and leucocyte sperm disease infertility.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討一氧化氮與白細胞精子症不育的關係。

sentences.english: Nitrous oxide comes from car exhausts and from chemical fertilizers.
sentences.chinese: 一氧化氮來自汽車廢氣和化學肥料。

definition: acetylcholine ACh (amine related to vitamin B complex)
